landingPage.description: Transform your dream of studying, working, or living in Germany into reality with expert-led courses and personalized guidance.

footer.startJourneyDesc: Get updates on new courses, visa requirements, and opportunities to move to Germany. Join thousands of Tunisians preparing for their German adventure.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Your journey to Germany in four simple steps
howItWorks.step1Description: Take our personalized assessment to identify the best pathway for your goals‚Äîwhether it's studying, working, or living in Germany.
howItWorks.step2Description: Follow our expert-led courses covering everything from German language to visa requirements and cultural integration.
howItWorks.step3Description: Get step-by-step guidance through the visa application process with document checklists and expert review.
howItWorks.step4Description: Arrive prepared and confident. Join our community of successful students and professionals already living their German dream.

pathways.title: Choose Your German Pathway
pathways.subtitle: Whether you're pursuing education, career opportunities, or a new life in Germany, we have a tailored pathway for your journey.
pathways.studyDescription: Master the German university system, ace your language tests, and secure your student visa‚Äîall in one structured pathway.
pathways.workDescription: Land your dream job with Germany's top employers. Learn job search strategies, CV optimization, and interview skills from industry experts.
pathways.liveDescription: Integrate seamlessly into German life. From finding housing to understanding culture, we'll guide you every step of the way.

faq.title: Most Frequent Questions
faq.subtitle: Get quick answers to common questions about moving to Germany. Watch short video guides directly below.

call.title: Book a Quick Call
call.subtitle: Get instant answers to your questions about studying, working, or living in Germany
call.bookCallDescription: Choose a convenient 30-minute time slot for a quick consultation.

benefits.confirmationDesc: Immediate email with call details and link
benefits.remindersDesc: Never miss your call with automated reminders
benefits.browserBasedDesc: No apps needed - join from any browser
benefits.flexibleDesc: Cancel or reschedule up to 24 hours before

call.faq1Question: What should I prepare before the call?
call.faq1Answer: Have your questions ready and any relevant documents (academic transcripts, work experience, etc.) that might help us provide better guidance.
call.faq2Answer: Yes, you can reschedule up to 24 hours before your scheduled time through the confirmation email you'll receive.
call.faq3Question: What if I need more time?
call.faq3Answer: If you need more in-depth consultation, we can schedule a 60-minute meeting or provide additional resources after the call.
